greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) read by rows, where o.g.f. for T(n,k) is n!*Sum_{k=0..n} (1+x)^(n-k)/k!.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..140, flattened
maple: G:=simplify(series(exp(x)/(1-x-x*y),x=0,13)): P[0]:=1: for n from 1 to 11 do P[n]:=sort(n!*coeff(G,x^n)) od: seq(seq(coeff(y*P[n],y^k),k=1..n+1),n=0..9);
seq(seq(T(n, k), k=0..n), n=0..9);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 12 2019
mathematica: Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 9}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 09 2019, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Aug 26 2002
